item.title: Bandcamp - Triosom, by I.Trio
item.description:
Bandcamp - Triosom, by I.Trio

Triosom by I.Trio, released 01 March 2009 1. Eiger 2. Triosom 3. Winterwind 4. Istanbul 5. Right 6. Stranger 7. Grandprix 8. One Of Them Cave17 29.04.09 "I.Trio, Triosom: Jazz-rock threesome from Europe led by guitarist Jan Trösch, who dares to ask the musical question "Can one shred tastefully?"
